about_the_game:
Misspell is a 2D action-adventure in the Metroidvania genre. Its plot unfolds on a large island - Melanor, isolated from the rest of the world. Life on the island remained relatively peaceful until the discovery of an unknown magical mineral. Research of it led to a massive catastrophe, causing the disappearance of an entire civilization. You will unveil the mysteries of the past becoming a participant in fateful events for the island. You will move forward, becoming a participant in fateful events for the island.

Key features:

- Open world of Melanor Island.
- Unique graphic style.
- A magic vine for interacting with the enchanting world.

Demo version development

Step by step, we are moving closer to the release of the game’s demo. Player feedback will influence the final version of the game, including new features, characters, locations and more.
